select ip_address as loginIp, count(1) as frequency from recharge_order_history where 1=1
and ip_address = #{ip}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%y%m%d')
group by ip_address
having count(1) >= #{count}
ORDER BY create_Time desc

SELECT distinct account, nickname fullName, member_id as memberId, ip_address as ipAddress, balance money, (select count(COALESCE(ip_address,'null')) from recharge_order_history where 1=1 and ip_address = ipAddress) ipCount from recharge_order_history WHERE 1=1 and account = #{} and ip_address = #{loginIp} and add_time between group by member_id, ip_address order by member_id desc, create_time desc
